L

loadFriendState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Friends
Loads the state of all friends (both map friends and followers) from preferences.
loadGrieversFromTiledMap(TiledMap, TiledMapTileLayer, TiledMapTileLayer) - Static method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Griever
Loads all Griever objects from the provided TiledMap, creating instances of Griever based on the map's properties and adding them to an array.
loadGrieverstate(int) - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Griever
Loads the Griever's state (position, stunned state, following state, random movement state, and lives cooldown) from the preferences file based on the given index.
loadHUDState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.HUD
Loads the saved state of the HUD from preferences.
loadItemState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Item
Loads the saved state of the item from preferences.
loadPlayerFromTiledMap(TiledMap, TiledMapTileLayer) - Static method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Player
Loads the player's initial state from the TiledMap by reading its position from the "player" layer.
loadPlayerState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Player
Loads the player's state from persistent storage and restores it.
loadState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.GameScreen
Loads the saved state of the game, restoring player, items, traps, walls, and keys.
loadState(Preferences, String) - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.CollectibleItem
Loads the state of collectible items from preferences.
loadTrapItemState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.TrapItem
Loads the saved state of the TrapItem, restoring the fog effect status.
loadTrapState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Trap
Loads the saved state of the trap, including its position and rock falling status.
loadWallState() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Wall
Loads previously saved wall state from game preferences.
